title: Amazing skin concept for Kindred
body: Lamb is now human and Wolf is your average dog, Kindred's ult can be a park complete with trees and everything. This idea is very rough so please post improvements to it and i will edit.

replies.body: Please tell me I'm not the only person who immediately thought "Adventure Time"...

> [{quoted}](name=DianasGotSwag,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=J6EiKLKI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-03T12:15:58.321+0000)
